Barrowford Contest 0 Test Piece Contest

A Garland of Classics
Barrowford, Lancashire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £16 and cup, 2nd £12, 3rd £8, 4th £6 and 5th £4 were divided between ishworth and Hinchliffe Mill. March contest - 1st(£2) Read, 2nd(£1) divided between Rishworth and Hinchliffe. 8th annual show promoted by Barrowford Horticultural Society. 5 bands competed.
Sept. 23, 2013, 9:16 p.m. Sept. 23, 2013, 9:22 p.m.
1 Colne Borough William Pollard
2 Read and Simonstone William Pollard
3 Cornholme A. Greenwood
4 Hinchliffe Mill Band Noel Thorpe
4 Rishworth and Ryburn Ernest Beaumont
